content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [wwi_staging].[Sale_Heap]
( 
	[TransactionId] [uniqueidentifier]  NOT NULL,
	[CustomerId] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[ProductId] [smallint]  NOT NULL,
	[Quantity] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
	[Price] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
	[TotalAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
	[TransactionDateId] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[ProfitAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
	[Hour] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
	[Minute] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
	[StoreId] [smallint]  NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [wwi_staging].[Sale]
(
    [TransactionId] [uniqueidentifier]  NOT NULL,
    [CustomerId] [int]  NOT NULL,
    [ProductId] [smallint]  NOT NULL,
    [Quantity] [smallint]  NOT NULL,
    [Price] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
    [TotalAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
    [TransactionDate] [int]  NOT NULL,
    [ProfitAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
    [Hour] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
    [Minute] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
    [StoreId] [smallint]  NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [CustomerId] ),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
    PARTITION
    (
        [TransactionDate] RANGE RIGHT FOR VALUES (20100101, 20100201, 20100301, 20100401, 20100501, 20100601, 20100701, 20100801, 20100901, 20101001, 20101101, 20101201, 20110101, 20110201, 20110301, 20110401, 20110501, 20110601, 20110701, 20110801, 20110901, 20111001, 20111101, 20111201, 20120101, 20120201, 20120301, 20120401, 20120501, 20120601, 20120701, 20120801, 20120901, 20121001, 20121101, 20121201, 20130101, 20130201, 20130301, 20130401, 20130501, 20130601, 20130701, 20130801, 20130901, 20131001, 20131101, 20131201, 20140101, 20140201, 20140301, 20140401, 20140501, 20140601, 20140701, 20140801, 20140901, 20141001, 20141101, 20141201, 20150101, 20150201, 20150301, 20150401, 20150501, 20150601, 20150701, 20150801, 20150901, 20151001, 20151101, 20151201, 20160101, 20160201, 20160301, 20160401, 20160501, 20160601, 20160701, 20160801, 20160901, 20161001, 20161101, 20161201, 20170101, 20170201, 20170301, 20170401, 20170501, 20170601, 20170701, 20170801, 20170901, 20171001, 20171101, 20171201, 20180101, 20180201, 20180301, 20180401, 20180501, 20180601, 20180701, 20180801, 20180901, 20181001, 20181101, 20181201, 20190101, 20190201, 20190301, 20190401, 20190501, 20190601, 20190701, 20190801, 20190901, 20191001, 20191101, 20191201)
    )
)


---- POLY BASE LOAD
--------------------
-- prerequsite for polybase Data source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ABSSimre
WITH
( TYPE = HADOOP,
    LOCATION = 'abfss://wwi-02@asadatalakeimre.dfs.core.windows.net'
);

-- prerequisite for polybase - file format 
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [ParquetFormatImre]
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)
GO

-- create a new schema for external tables
CREATE SCHEMA [wwi_external];
GO

-- needs following 
-- location 
-- previously defined datasource
-- previsouly defined file format
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [wwi_external].Sales
    (
        [TransactionId] [nvarchar](36)  NOT NULL,
        [CustomerId] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [ProductId] [smallint]  NOT NULL,
        [Quantity] [smallint]  NOT NULL,
        [Price] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
        [TotalAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
        [TransactionDate] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [ProfitAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
        [Hour] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
        [Minute] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
        [StoreId] [smallint]  NOT NULL
    )
WITH
    (
        LOCATION = '/sale-small/Year=2019',  
        DATA_SOURCE = ABSSImre,
        FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormatImre]  
    )  
GO

-- insert the external table just created 
INSERT INTO [wwi_staging].[Sale_Heap]
SELECT *
FROM [wwi_external].[Sales]

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM wwi_staging.Sale_Heap(nolock)


-- Trying cooy operation 
-- truncating table
TRUNCATE TABLE wwi_staging.Sale_Heap;
GO

-- Replace <PrimaryStorage> with the workspace default storage account name.
COPY INTO wwi_staging.Sale_Heap
FROM 'https://asadatalakeimre.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/sale-small/Year=2019'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET',
    COMPRESSION = 'SNAPPY'
)
GO

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM wwi_staging.Sale_Heap(nolock)

COPY INTO wwi_staging.Sale
FROM 'https://asadatalakeimre.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/sale-small%2FYear%3D2019'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET',
    COMPRESSION = 'SNAPPY'
)
GO

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM wwi_staging.Sale(nolock)

-- truncating CCI table
TRUNCATE TABLE wwi_staging.Sale;
GO

-- Loading it from Heap Table
INSERT INTO [wwi_staging].[Sale]
SELECT *
FROM [wwi_staging].[Sale_Heap]

CREATE TABLE [wwi_staging].DailySalesCounts2
    (
        [Date] [nvarchar](24) ,
        [NorthAmerica] [int]  ,
        [SouthAmerica] [int]  ,
        [Europe] [int]  ,
        [Africa] [int]  ,
        [Asia] [int]  
    )
GO

DROP TABLE [wwi_staging].DailySalesCounts2; 

TRUNCATE TABLE wwi_staging.DailySalesCounts;

COPY INTO wwi_staging.DailySalesCounts
FROM 'https://asadatalakeimre.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/campaign-analytics/dailycounts4.txt'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR='.',
    ROWTERMINATOR=','
)
GO

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wwi_staging.DailySalesCounts; 

TRUNCATE TABLE wwi_staging.DailySalesCounts2;

-- Replace <PrimaryStorage> with the workspace default storage account name.
COPY INTO wwi_staging.DailySalesCounts2
FROM 'https://asadatalakeimre.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/campaign-analytics/dailycounts3.txt'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR=';',
    ROWTERMINATOR='0X0A',
    ENCODING = 'UTF8',
    FIELDQUOTE='"'
)
GO

SELECT * FROM [wwi_staging].DailySalesCounts2
ORDER BY [Date] DESC

SELECT count(*) FROM [wwi_staging].DailySalesCounts
